name: WORMHOLE (itch)
description:
You've entered the wormhole.

You wake up.

Where are you?

Who are you?
What happened?
Was someone else with you?
How did you get there?

All you know is that you have to keep moving forward. But are you even sure about that? You see something in front of you and stand in it. Something comes back to you. A memory.

WORMHOLE

Find the rest of your past to press on in this puzzle parkour game and solve the secrets of the wormhole.

Currently in Development Version 0.7

Act I is finally finished!

Contact: @speicherjacob
